Package com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.security

Interface Summary
Interface Description
IAuthenticationModule Interface class that all loadable authentication modules should implement.
IAuthorizationModule Interface class that all loadable authorization modules should implement.
 

Class Summary
Class Description
BaseAuthenticationManager Class implementing the connectors AuthenticationManager interface of the connector.
BaseAuthorizationManager Class implementing the Authorization Iterface of the connector This class is called by the connector when it needs to authenticate a user
PermissiveAuthentication Class implementing the Authentication Iterface of the salesforce connector This class is if the startup parameter in tomcat has
-DAUmodule_connectorinstancename=com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.security.PermisiveAuthentication
This module allows all users to get authentication
PermissiveAuthorization
